1.title: Manage your BONDE here
1.description: Up here you can check which page you are on and navigate between the main sessions of your communities and mobilizations.

2.title: Keep an eye on this little corner
2.description: Your profile, your notifications and the main actions are always around.

3.title: Access your communities
3.description: The community is a group that unites for a cause. From it you can create mobilizations and invite others to come together.

4.title: Create mobilizations to cause
4.description: It is through the mobilizations that you will generate an impact. Here you can see the mobs of your communities and access them with a click.

5.title: Support the causes you believe
5.description: Access the latest mobilizations related to the causes you support and help other communities make a difference!
